== Main inclusion report for glitz ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/g/glitz, compiled on all arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' New build dependency of `libcairo` which is already in main

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* No executables.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: only a library, no end user tool.
* Bugs: no Debian  bugs, no upstream bug tracker.
* Interacts with OpenGL hardware.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `cdbs` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian policy met.

=== Reviewers ===

MartinPitt: approved
